channel.title: Postman on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Postman on Automaly

item.title: All about Odata actions in Dynamics 365 Finance And Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to creating and using OData actions in D365 Finance Operations data entities including Power Automate integration and automation scenarios.

item.title: Testing Dynamics 365 Finance Database Movement API with Postman
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Test Dynamics 365 Finance Database Movement APIs using Postman with complete authentication setup and examples. Learn to list backups, refresh databases, and export data programmatically.

item.title: Consuming Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide for consuming D365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET applications including authentication, service principal setup, and C# implementation.

item.title: Business events and HTTPs endpoint
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to setting up Business Events with HTTPS endpoints in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations using Azure Functions, AAD app registration, and Key Vault for secure webhook integration.

item.title: Insert multiple records in a single transaction using Odata from Postman
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to insert multiple records in a single OData batch request using Postman for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations integration.
